content.rendered:
This page covers all of the team compositions in The Pokémon League in Pokémon Unbound. This includes teams for each Elite Four member and the final Champion battle.

Note: As of this writing we only have teams for vanilla difficulty, and only for the mainline E4 battles (not post-game). We will be adding all difficulties and post-game teams in the near future.
Table of Contents

  • Elite Four Moleman (Ground Type)
  • Elite Four Elias (Ghost Type)
  • Elite Four Arabella (Fairy Type)
  • Elite Four Penny (Dragon Type)
  • Rival Jax

Elite Four Moleman (Ground Type)

Elite Four Moleman has two Full Restores he uses when his Pokemon are in kill range. He challenges you to a double battle for this fight. Additionally, the battlefield has a Vicious Sandstorm.

Elite Four Moleman
Pokémon Excadrill (Level 74 at cap) Flygon (Level 76 at cap) Sandslash (Level 76 at cap) Quagsire (Level 74 at cap) Gliscor (Level 75 at cap)
Type Ground/Steel Ground/Dragon Ground Water/Ground Ground/Flying
Ability Sand Rush Levitate Sand Rush Water Absorb Sand Veil
Held Item – Ground Gem – Sitrus Berry –
Weaknesses

Elite Four Elias (Ghost Type)

Elite Four Elias has a Shadowy Veil set on the battlefield. He also uses a single Full Restore when one of his Pokemon are in kill range.

Elite Four Elias
Pokémon Mimikyu (Level 74 at cap) Aegislash (Level 75 at cap) Trevenant (Level 75 at cap) Chandelure (Level 76 at cap) Mega Banette (Level 76 at cap)
Type Ghost/Fairy Steel/Ghost Ghost/Grass Ghost/Fire Ghost/Normal
Ability Disguise Stance Change Harvest Flash Fire Insomnia/Frisk – Prankster

Elite Four Arabella (Fairy Type)

Elite Four Arabella’s battlefield has a permanent misty terrain. She also uses two Full Restores when her Pokemon are in kill range.

Elite Four Penny (Dragon Type)

The final Elite Four member, Penny, challenges you to a double-rainbow battle. She has two full restores which are used when their Pokemon are in kill range.

Elite Four Penny
Pokémon Goodra (Level 74 at cap) Tyrantrum (Level 75 at cap) Kommo-o (Level 75 at cap) Hydreigon (Level 76 at cap) Mega Sceptile (Level 76 at cap)

Rival Jax

Similar to the original game, our rival stands in our way at the end of the Elite Four. Jax challenges you to a double battle and he has three Full Restores that he uses when his Pokemon are in kill range.

Rival Jax
Pokémon Mega Salamence (Level 76 at cap) Hitmontop (Level 74 at cap) Magnezone (Level 75 at cap) Gastrodon (Level 74 at cap) Pyroar (Level 76 at cap) Staraptor (Level 75 at cap)
Type Dragon/Flying Fighting Electric/Steel Water/Ground Fire/Normal Normal/Flying
Ability Intimidate – Aerilate Intimidate Sturdy Storm Drain Unnerve Intimidate
